reviewtext: What can be said about a memory card.  It works very well, this is my third, the oldest one is almost 3 years and working with no problems.  An added bonus is it comes in a little plactic box which makes it safer for storage in the camera bag.  The rabate makes it very inexpensive too!I also have the Viking card reader for a laptop, was only $9 and makes transfering pictures to computer no effort at all!
